thread.title: Coronation Street extends Helen Flanagan's contract despite viewer complaints about her acting
thread.title_full: Coronation Street extends Helen Flanagan's contract despite viewer complaints about her acting

author: Joshua Haigh
title: Coronation Street extends Helen Flanagan's contract despite viewer complaints about her acting
text:
Coronation Street extends Helen Flanagan's contract despite viewer complaints about her acting ITV viewers have slammed the star over her recent appearances on the show Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Rosie is arrested for DRUG SMUGGLING on Corrie Share this video Get soaps updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Helen Flanagan is sticking around on Coronation Street for longer than first planned. 
The ITV actress, who plays Rosie Webster, recently returned to the soap with her on-screen sister, and the two characters quickly found themselves in a heap of trouble with police. 
After being released after authorities realised they weren't trying to traffic drugs after all, the pair tried their best to keep what remained left of their reputation. 
However, Corrie fans haven't been welcoming of Helen since she returned to the cobbles, and many slammed the star this week over her acting. Helen is sticking around (Photo: ITV) 
Despite their comments, the show has announced that the actress will now be sticking around until at least December - six months more than previously planned. 
Show boss Kate Oates said: “We are thrilled to have Helen back and delighted that she is now going to become a more permanent fixture in Weatherfield. 
“Rosie is a classic Coronation Street comedy character and we are looking forward to seeing more of her antics in the future.” 
Helen added: “I am having so much fun being back here playing Rosie again. The writing is hilarious and I am delighted to be staying around. Fans have slammed her acting (Photo: ITV) 
Earlier this week, viewers took to Twitter to rant about the star's acting on the ITV soap. 
"Surely this girl playing Rosie is the worst actress ever? #corrie," ranted one viewer. 
Others moaned at soap bosses for making Rosie "even stupider" than she was before leaving the soap the first time around. Read More 
"Did Rosie suffer some kind of head injury while she was away? #Corrie," said one baffled fan. 
While another added: "Surely this girl playing Rosie is the worst actress ever? #corrie" She's on a three-month contract (Photo: ITV) Read More 
Helen - who is on a three-month contract at Corrie for the moment - recently revealed Rosie looks set for a romance with Adam Barlow. 
Speaking on Loose Women, she said: “There’s a spark with Adam Barlow." Like us on Facebook
